Ultra Optimus: Looks around the crash site."Hm... nothing out of the 
unusual...", then hears a figure calling out to him. Asks, "Who are 
you? And what is the Alliance? I need to know more about it first." 
Via com to Liono Prime:"Liono Prime, do you dare come here to 
challenge me?", "I am at the old Axalon site, where my ship just 
crashed, meet me here next to the water fall if you accept!"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Ultra Optimus " <highlordtemplar@e...> 
wrote:
> Ultra Optimus: Hmmmm.....I'd join, if I knew what the heck it 
was... 
> but however, but sure...why not... I wish to challenge Liono prime, 
> seeing he is the leader of the Maximals. liono Prime, I wish to 
> sample your might, if you have any... I call to you Liomo Prime, 
for 
> a duel! I wish to see if you are a challenge!
> 
>  
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > Scattershot:
> > 
> > Scattershot looked to DevilDuer.  "Hold on, I'm picking something 
> up on my 
> > internal scanners." after walking a few minutes, he rounded a 
> corner of the 
> > small crashed ship.  Raising his rifle at Ultra Optimus, he 
looked 
> him up and 
> > down.  "Hmmm...good enough to join I suppose.  Puny 
> though.  "Alright, state 
> > who you are!  We are from the Alliance!  The strongest faction on 
> the planet. 
> >  Do you wish to join us?"
